bill.title: Sale of Checks Act; rename "MS Money Transmitters Act: and make various amendments.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 75-15-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Change The Name Of The Chapter From The "sale Of Checks Law" To The "money Transmitters Act"; To Amend Section 75-15-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Define Certain Terms; To Amend Section 75-15-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; To Amend Section 75-15-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Exemptions Provided In The Act; To Amend Section 75-15-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Applicants For Licensure Shall Not Have Been Convicted Of A Felony Or Certain Misdemeanors; To Amend Section 75-15-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Surety Bond Requirement For Licensees; To Amend Sections 75-15-13, 75-15-15 And 75-15-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; To Amend Section 75-15-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require Certain Licensees To Submit Reports Of Outstanding Money Transmissions On A Monthly Basis And To Require Licensees To Maintain Certain Records; To Amend Section 75-15-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; To Amend Section 75-15-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Limitation On The Total Amount In Outstanding Money Transmissions Or Checks Of Licensees; To Amend Section 75-15-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify That A License Shall Be Automatically And Finally Revoked Upon Failure By Licensee To File When Due Certain Information Required By Law; To Amend Section 75-15-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Maximum Amount By Which The Commissioner May Increase The Surety Bond Or Deposit Required By Licensees; To Amend Section 75-15-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; To Create A New Section To Require Certain Licensees To Possess Permissible Investments Having An Aggregate Market Value Of Not Less Than The Aggregate Amount Of Outstanding Checks; To Create A New Section To Require Each Licensee To Comply With State And Federal Money Laundering Laws; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Banking and Financial Services
